Description.Text: The London City Suites are situated next to the Barbican, in the heart of the City of London. They offer luxurious bedrooms, free Wi-Fi, and flat-screen TVs with satellite channels. Guests at the London City Suites by Metcalf can make use of an on-site wellness center. A number of treatments are available at the state-of-the-art spa. There is a bar for guests to relax in, and they can dine in the on-site restaurant. There is also a 24-hour front desk and concierge service to use.The suites are a 10-minute walk from Barbican Underground Station and London Liverpool Street. Fleet Street is a mile away, and Oxford Street is easily accessible on the Tube.
The suites are a 10-minute walk from Barbican Underground Station and London Liverpool Street. Fleet Street is a mile away, and Oxford Street is easily accessible on the Tube.

Deluxe Suites - Deluxe Suite offers one double bed.
